description: This file defines a UI component named 'Button' using the LightningJS framework. It includes a template with conditional text based on component state and handles user input to toggle the 'favorited' state.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a customizable button with toggle functionality.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component state with default values for 'isFavorited', 'favoriteText', and 'unfavoriteText'.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the 'enter' input event to toggle the 'isFavorited' boolean.
